code:
class KStack:
    def __init__(self, n, k):
        self.stack = [0] * k
        self.top = [-1] * k
        self.size = [0] * k
        self.elements = [0] * (k * n)
        self.next = [0] * (k * n)
        self.index = [0] * k
        self.next_index = 0

    def push(self, stack_num, item):
        self.size[stack_num] += 1
        self.elements[self.next_index] = item
        self.next[self.next_index] = -1
        self.top[stack_num] += 1
        self.index[stack_num] = self.next_index
        self.next_index += 1

    def pop(self, stack_num):
        if self.top[stack_num] == -1:
            return -1
        item = self.elements[self.index[stack_num]]
        self.top[stack_num] -= 1
        if self.top[stack_num] == -1:
            self.size[stack_num] -= 1
        self.next[self.index[stack_num]] = self.next[self.index[stack_num]]
        self.index[stack_num] = self.next[self.index[stack_num]]
        return item
